title: K-9 unit to patrol Ballard High School following threat
text: LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) – Students at a Jefferson County Public School will be greeted by a K-9 unit Friday morning.The K-9 unit and police officers will be at Ballard High School after school officials said the school received a threat. [MORE: JCPS News] A JCPS spokeswoman said the district does not believe the threat is creditable, but extra security will be on school grounds. Copyright 2015 WAVE 3 News. All rights reserved.
